name: promptspark
description: A comprehensive prompt management system for AI workers

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w backend" "npm run dev -w frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build -w backend && npm run build -w frontend && npm run build -w extension
scripts.test: npm test -w backend && npm test -w frontend
scripts.test:watch: concurrently "npm run test:watch -w backend" "npm run test:watch -w frontend"
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage -w backend && npm run test:coverage -w frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w backend && npm run lint -w frontend
